content: {"name": "Christian Faith Center of Creedmoor", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Go in person to fill out a form and apply for pantry, and they will give an appointment for pick up ", "email": "", "url": "https://cfcnc.us/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "101 Peachtree Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Creedmoor", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "27522", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 36.1159205, "longitude": -78.6784096}, "phones": [{"number": "(919) 528-1581", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "01:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}]}
